Detailed Description

Represents a position in a document.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Create a document position instance.

Line and column are initialized to 0.

virtual void QPlainText::DocumentPosition::onSetColumn ( int  coulumn  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Called after column changes with old column value.

This is meant to allow subclasses to implement signals on position changed while keeping this class lightweight.

Reimplemented in QPlainText::Caret.

virtual void QPlainText::DocumentPosition::onSetLine ( int  line  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Called after line number changes with old line value.

This is meant to allow subclasses to implement signals on position changed while keeping this class lightweight.

Reimplemented in QPlainText::Caret.
